news.title: Started Joint PhD Program at National University of Singapore
news.content: Officially commenced research at NUS; exploring cross-disciplinary paths in environment & AI.

news.title: Participated in AUA Graduate Forum & GBA Nanshan Academic Forum
news.content: Presented the topic “Use of Polyurethane Sponge for rapid start-up of anammox: microbial enrichment and spatial distribution of functional genes”, and was invited to deliver a speech as student representative at the closing ceremony.

news.title: Participated in International Anammox Symposium & First National Anammox Technology Exchange Conference
news.content: Delivered an oral presentation on “Accelerating start-up of anammox in MBBR using polyurethane sponge carriers” and won the Best Presentation Award.

education.major: Environmental Science & Engineering (Joint Ph.D.) | QS Rank 8

Water Supply & Drainage Science and Engineering | Bachelor (Recommended for Admission)
Finance | Bachelor (Double Degree)

intro: Development of low-carbon processes for urban sewage treatment towards dual-carbon goals, regulation of microbial metabolic mechanisms, and system engineering applications.

Dedicated to the synergistic resource utilization path of kitchen waste and sewage treatment, converting biochemical reaction mechanisms into industrial Standard Operating Procedures (SOP) to achieve long-term stable operation and low-carbon delivery of engineering projects.

projects.name: Innovation & Entrepreneurship Competition | Carbon Chain Synergy & Value Transformation Platform
details: Problem Definition: Targeting the fragmentation of accounting standards and mismatch of benefits, proposing a digital collaborative solution.
Cross-boundary Coordination: Led a cross-disciplinary team from Tsinghua and Peking University to develop an AI carbon platform (98% accuracy), solving the pain point of manual accounting efficiency.
Achievements: Won National Third Prize in Graduate "Dual Carbon" Competition, First Prize at Tsinghua, and Winner of Kunshan Cup.

projects.name: Shenzhen Science and Technology Innovation Commission Sustainable Development Special Project | R&D and Application of Kitchen Waste Hydrolysate PD/A Denitrification Process
details: Technical R&D: Led the R&D of a PD/A coupling system based on kitchen waste, overcoming the industry-level bottleneck of microbial community instability.
Commercialization: In-situ conversion completely replaced external carbon sources, reducing costs by 30%~50%, and implementing a 50 m³/d demonstration project.

projects.name: National Key R&D Program Youth Project | Low-carbon Preparation of Bio-based Plastics from Brewing Waste
details: Product R&D: Developed new bio-based materials, extending the shelf life of fruits and vegetables by more than 1 time and reducing raw material costs by 40%.

internships.desc: Produced a 10,000-word research report, with 5 suggestions fully adopted.

internships.position: Project Marketing Dept | Marketing Management Intern | May 2020 - Jul 2020
internships.desc: Became the top salesperson in the first month of employment; conversion rate significantly better than average.

internships.position: Digital Technology Center | Digital Operations Intern | Feb 2021 - Apr 2021
internships.desc: Unified 200+ key field calibers across the entire chain and established a structured maintenance mechanism.

campus.role: Counselor & Psychology Club President | Mar 2023 - Sep 2025
campus.desc: Built a Chinese-English bilingual psychological support system, improving organizational efficiency by 60%.
Pioneered a closed-loop management system, coordinated 40+ performances, and achieved the first campus championship.
Awarded Tsinghua "Outstanding Class" (Top 5%), with 100% peer review excellence rate for three consecutive years.

honors: National Scholarship, Provincial Outstanding Graduate, Outstanding Student Cadre, Tsinghua Comprehensive Scholarship, Outstanding Social Work Scholarship, Sichuan Agricultural University Annual Outstanding Graduate Student Model, Master's Academic Scholarship, Outstanding Academic Achievement, Best Presentation Award, Outstanding Literary and Artistic Backbone, etc.
interests: Badminton, Classical Dance, Swimming, Football, Music, Hiking
